item.title: The C++/CX String^ is not an object, even though it wears a hat
item.description: C++/CX refers to Windows Runtime strings as Platform::String^ with a hat instead of a star. But even though the string wears a hat, it is not an Object^. The String^ type is a representation of the Windows Runtime HSTRING. And of the rules of HSTRING is that a null pointer is a valid HSTRING,
item.author: (Raymond Chen)
